0011011000111101 1110110001010110 0 -> sum: 0010001010010011, cout: 1

0100101000100001 1101100110111000 1 -> sum: 0010001111011010, cout: 1
0101011110010001 0010010101110101 0 -> sum: 0111110100000110, cout: 0
0011100000100000 0001110110011110 0 -> sum: 0101010110111110, cout: 0
0011011100001110 0110100000011100 1 -> sum: 1001111100101011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
